attributes.action: Change English Legal System for buying properties
attributes.additional_details: Adapt the Scottish system for buying property in England
attributes.background: Adapt the Scottish system for buying property in England. Millions of pounds are wasted every year due to English legal system. 30% of purchases fall through due to the lack of commitment, or issues with the chain and so many families suffer financially with chains falling through.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action:

Introduce conveyancing laws similar to those in Scotland, across England & Wales
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709395
